basics.name: Sopheak Chim
basics.label: Aspiring Engineer
basics.summary: Aspiring Engineer with a strong foundation in scripting, automation, and diagnostics. Experienced in Linux environments, MERN stack development, and project-based collaboration. Seeking SWE/SDE roles that combine hands-on technical skills with a strong focus on design, user experience, and test-driven development.

work.name: Silvus Technologies
work.summary: Developing automation scripts and performing diagnostics for R&D.
highlights: Troubleshot hardware/software edge cases by parsing test logs, using Linux CLI tools to distinguish between script errors and firmware/radio malfunctions.
Supported internal CRM systems and QA processes by maintaining traceable logs, summaries, and device testing status.
Collaborated cross-functionally with Engineering and QC for root cause analysis and early-stage test coverage improvement.

work.name: Walmart
work.summary: Delivered knowledgeable customer support on electronics products and resolved technical issues through first-line troubleshooting.

projects.name: Real-Time MERN Chat App
projects.summary: Built and deployed a complete chat system using the MERN stack and Socket.io for live messaging. Collaborated in an Agile team using Figma for UI design, GitHub Projects for sprint planning, and peer code reviews for QA.
highlights: Created modular API routes with Express
Built dynamic frontend using React and DaisyUI

projects.name: AI Desktop Assistant Overlay
projects.summary: Built an Electron-based voice assistant overlay tool for personal productivity and LLM interaction. Integrated Whisper for speech-to-text, DeepSeek API for contextual LLM responses, and Kkokoro TTS for audio output.
highlights: Designed a transparent floating chat overlay for passive multitasking
Added clipboard access and passive screen overlay chat

projects.name: Weather-Based Outfit Color Recommender
projects.summary: Pulled live weather data using WeatherAPI mapped conditions to warm/cool color palettes, and generated matching tones using a colour-combination-dictionary. Rendered suggestions dynamically based on real-time temperature analysis.
highlights: Built with custom UI components using React and TailwindCSS

projects.name: Boba Shop Site (HLT)
projects.summary: Partnered directly with the business owner to scope features, establish timelines, and translate goals into a web-friendly design system. Designed and developed a fully responsive site from scratch using Next.js and TailwindCSS.
highlights: Acted as both developer and UI/UX consultant
Built custom components for product displays and filtering
